## noicejs package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |

|  [Module](./noicejs.module.md) | Provides a set of dependencies, bound in the <code>configure</code> method. |
|  [NullLogger](./noicejs.nulllogger.md) | Logger implementation that consumes input and produces no output. |
